name: Meta-Bell
description:
The Meta-robot is broken and is on a cave. Will the bell save that robot or lead him to his death?Discover yourself man,or woman,no one's judging here.

This game was made for the Aardjam-2 and is also my first full working project that i could submit.

controls:

jump:up arrow or w

Left:left arrow or a

right:right arrow or d

By the way, if you get on a loop, know that it isn't the end. The solution is for you to discover.
